alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 13 at 9:04PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northerly winds at 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Entire Tri-State area. * WHEN...Late Friday morning through sunset Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions are anticipated to be the primary impact, especially on all west to east routes such as Interstate 70, where cross winds will be strongest. High profile vehicles will see the worst impacts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
